Something about me

 
Hello, I am Mayank Singh Kushwah web developer.

I am yet studying.I am a student of computer science engineering.
I am highly ambitious and enthusiastic towards My learning and career development. 
I am happy to tell you about my contribution in my field. 
I have developed lot's of projects based on php technology. 
Such as staff mangament, student mangament system. I have worked in Techcato projections pvt. Ltd. As intern. 
Here I have developed CRM ,DTR (daily time tracker) onlinenotepad, Or email templates and also worked on wordpress. 
I would love to share my skills. I am a youtuber, blogger, local guide in google map. 
I have got perks and also have been selected thrice for Top local guides of city. 
Friends, I have knowledge about digital marketing such as how to work on Google my business,seo, ad-sense,email marketing.
